publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-373 Karen Whitefield: School Investmentâ€”That the Parliament notes the significant improvements that have been made to a number of schools in North Lanarkshire through the 2010 rebuilding programme, with improved learning environments and additional facilities for communities; notes that a large number of schools in North Lanarkshire remain in need of substantial refurbishment or rebuilding; expresses concern at the delay in the provision of information from the Scottish Executive to local authorities, such as North Lanarkshire, about the funding mechanisms for such a programme, and calls on the Executive to bring forward proposals to enable continued improvement of the school estate in North Lanarkshire.
S3M-373 School Investment (lodged on 20 August 2007) Jack McConnell*
